label: 床脚
本: Exhibition of Shōsō-in Treasures , The 55th  . Nara National Museum . 2003
説明文: Box-shaped legs attached to tables and boxes to raise them off the ground. Generally they have openwork sides with ornate negative spaces (kōzama) and rest flat on the ground. The bottom rectangular frame foot is known as a tatamizuri. [格狭間、畳摺]
